author: Marvel Entertainment
description: Dive face-first into Marvel’s Deadpool VR on November 18, 2025. Only on Meta Quest 3 and 3S. Deadpool’s gonna be a star! The merc with a mouth just signed brand new contract with Mojo, the biggest name in intergalactic streaming. There’s just one problem: he didn’t read the fine print. Because come on, who does that? Now, he’s off to “recruit” (aka kidnap) some of the toughest villains in the Marvel Universe. Face off against Marvel fan-favorites like Mephisto, Lady Deathstrike, Omega Red, and *checks notes* Ultimo, as he tries to fulfill his contract and make serious bank (while fighting for his life along the way). Blend parkour with a freeform combat system to take down foes with style and unlock Marvelous weapons, like the mighty Mojo-nir Hammer (aka Thundery Long Hair's Mojo-ified hammer)! Get rich and die trying (again and again) to entertain Mojo’s massive audience. Featuring Neil Patrick Harris as Deadpool and John Leguizamo as Mojo. A galactic audience is watching your every
title: Marvel’s Deadpool VR | Official Story Trailer | Meta Quest Platforms
